programme.desc: The plains of Africa are home to nature's most fearsome predators - Cheetahs, Lions, Hyenas. But the battle for survival is never one sided, even the prey animals are formidable. programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: In an action packed episode of Animal Fight Club we reveal what happens when the Animal Kingdom's most vicious species fight tooth and claw in the deadliest of conflicts. programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: Nature's vicious battles for survival come at every scale, from 6 ton Elephants, fighting in a testosterone fuelled blind fury, to slime covered inch and half long amphibian kick boxers, dangling in the jaws of death.
